name: Azrael
description: Gargamel's pet cat. Azrael tends to realize beforehand that Gargamel's schemes will go awry, but reluctantly goes along with them anyway in hopes of possibly capturing a Smurf to eat. Black and white digital sketch. Made for Inktober 2018 on Ibis Paint X on a Samsung Galaxy Tab S3. 2048 x 2048 @350 dpi.
